strings:
<se_low>Yangus: Guv! Did you 'ear that!?
That bird said Dhoulmagus is inside the ruins!

<se_low>Yangus: Nice one!
Looks like we've finally caught up wiv 'im!

<se_high>Jessica: At last!
Now I can finally avenge Alistair's death!

<se_def>Angelo: Hold on a second!
Let's not get ahead of ourselves here.
We don't know if they're right yet.
<se_low>Yangus: How'd they know about Dhoulmagus then, eh? Dunno wot that soldier bloke was on about, mind. Wot was all that about 'is boss bein' killed?

<se_def>Angelo: Dhoulmagus's minions indeed! The cheek!
I draw the line at taking orders from floating jesters!
<se_def>Angelo: Anyway, <hero>, they said Dhoulmagus was inside the ruins.
<se_def>Angelo: If that's true, then I suppose it means we've caught up with him at last.
<se_high>Jessica: Now I finally have the chance to take avenge my brother's death...
<se_high>Jessica: How dare they!? How could they possibly think I'd have anything to do with that monster!?
<se_high>Jessica: Anyway, they said Dhoulmagus is inside the ruins, right?

<se_high>Jessica: Then we've finally caught up with him!
It's time to take my revenge at last...

<se_low>King Trode: How preposterous!
What utter nincompoops, thinking that we're in cahoots with that dastardly Dhoulmagus!

<se_low>King Trode: But enough of that!
Did you hear them, Yangus?
They said he's inside the ruins!
<se_low>Yangus: COR BLIMEY!
<se_low>King Trode: Oh, pull yourself together!
<se_low>King Trode: If they're correct, it means that Dhoulmagus is within arm's reach at last!

<se_high>Jessica: So Dhoulmagus is inside the ruins! Oh, Alistair...
Now I can finally avenge your death.

<se_low>King Trode: Enough of that!
Did you hear them, Angelo?
They said he's inside the ruins!

<se_def>Angelo: Are you sure you trust that motley bunch?
I mean, we have no idea if what they said is true. We should ask them for more information.
<se_low>King Trode: Well! I'd have thought a bit more excitement was in order! If those chaps are right, we've finally got Dhoulmagus just where we want him!

<se_high>Jessica: So Dhoulmagus is inside the ruins! Oh, Alistair...
Now I can finally avenge your death.

<se_low>King Trode: Enough of that!
Did you hear them, Jessica?
They said he's inside the ruins!
<se_high>Jessica: Yeah, so they said. If they're right, that means I can finally avenge Alistair's death.

<se_high>Jessica: The Dark Ruins... Now we know where he's hiding, there's no way he can escape.
He's like a rat in a trap.

<se_low>King Trode: How preposterous!
What utter nincompoops, thinking that we're in cahoots with that dastardly Dhoulmagus!

<se_low>King Trode: Enough of that!
Did you hear them, <hero>?
They said he's inside the ruins!
<se_low>King Trode: I wonder if they're right. We should go and press them for more information.
